query:
SELECT 
  c.id,
  c.title,
  c.description,
  c.course_type as courseType,
  c.is_active as isActive,
  COUNT(DISTINCT q.id) as total,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN qp.first_attempt_status != 'unanswered' THEN qp.question_id END) as answered,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN qp.first_attempt_status = 'correct' THEN qp.question_id END) as correct
FROM courses c
LEFT JOIN topics t ON t.course_id = c.id
LEFT JOIN questions q ON q.topic_id = t.id
LEFT JOIN question_progress qp ON qp.question_id = q.id AND qp.user_id = 1
WHERE c.is_active = 1
GROUP BY c.id, c.title, c.description, c.course_type, c.is_active
LIMIT 5;

LEFT JOIN topics t ON t.course_id = c.id
LEFT JOIN questions q ON q.topic_id = t.id
LEFT JOIN question_progress qp ON qp.question_id = q.id AND qp.user_id = 1
WHERE c.is_active = 1
GROUP BY c.id, c.title, c.description, c.course_type, c.is_active
